tidbits.title: Archipelago of Islands
tidbits.description: The Philippines is an archipelago of over 7,000 islands known for its stunning beaches, diverse landscapes, and marine biodiversity.

tidbits.title: Cultural Melting Pot
tidbits.description: The country is a cultural melting pot, blending influences from indigenous tribes, Spanish colonial history, and Asian traditions.

tidbits.title: Warm Hospitality
tidbits.description: Filipinos are known for their warm hospitality and strong family values, contributing to the country's welcoming atmosphere.
